Notes.Text:
This update for slurm fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-19727: Fix permissions of configuration file 'slurmdbd.conf' (bsc#1155784).
- Fix ownership of /var/spool/slurm on new installations and upgrade (bsc#1158696).
- Fix '%posttrans' macro to cope with added newline (bsc#1153259).
